testcase.name: Complete Authoring Journey E2E › user can create book, generate TOC, add chapters, answer questions, and generate draft
Complete Authoring Journey E2E › handles errors gracefully during AI operations
Complete Authoring Journey E2E › preserves progress across browser refresh
Editing & Auto-save Flow › auto-saves content after 3-second debounce
Editing & Auto-save Flow › backs up content to localStorage when network fails
Editing & Auto-save Flow › recovers content from localStorage backup
Editing & Auto-save Flow › dismisses localStorage backup without restoring
Editing & Auto-save Flow › shows correct save status indicators during lifecycle
Editing & Auto-save Flow › respects 3-second debounce for auto-save
Editing & Auto-save Flow › saves successfully after network recovers from failure
Error Recovery Flow - Automatic Retry with Exponential Backoff › automatically retries transient 503 error and succeeds on second attempt
Error Recovery Flow - Automatic Retry with Exponential Backoff › respects exponential backoff timing across multiple retries
Error Recovery Flow - Automatic Retry with Exponential Backoff › does not retry validation errors (400 Bad Request)
Error Recovery Flow - Automatic Retry with Exponential Backoff › respects maximum retry limit of 3 attempts and shows final error
Error Recovery Flow - Automatic Retry with Exponential Backoff › retries network errors and eventually succeeds
Error Recovery Flow - Automatic Retry with Exponential Backoff › retries rate limit errors (429) with exponential backoff
Error Recovery Flow - Automatic Retry with Exponential Backoff › does not retry authentication errors (401 Unauthorized)
Error Recovery Flow - Automatic Retry with Exponential Backoff › shows appropriate loading states during retry attempts
Interview-Style Prompts Cross-Browser Tests › Question generation works across all browsers
Interview-Style Prompts Cross-Browser Tests › Question response interface is accessible
Interview-Style Prompts Cross-Browser Tests › Mobile question interface works correctly
Interview-Style Prompts Cross-Browser Tests › Question progress tracking persists across browser sessions

Interview-Style Prompts Cross-Browser Tests › High-contrast mode compatibility
